package.name: motoman_sda10f_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman SDA10F (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman SDA10F manipulators. This currently includes the base model and the CSDA10F variant (ie: clean standard).

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online http://www.motoman.com/datasheets/sda10f.pdf for SDA10F and in the MOTOMAN-CSDA10D/CSDA10F INSTRUCTIONS (HW1481698) version 173323-1CD, rev 0 for CSDA10F.
All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Amrith Ganesh
Daniel Ordonez
Thiago de Freitas
Shaun Edwards
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
